definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: I can tell you a lot of things about this family, Inspector.
sentences.chinese: 探长，我可以告诉你有关这个家的许多事。

sentences.english: She wanted everyone to see him, and listen to him, ’Inspector Walsh said.
sentences.chinese: 她想要大家都看见他，并听他说话，”沃尔什探长说。

sentences.english: ‘Of course. This is your house, ’Inspector Walsh said.
sentences.chinese: “当然，这是你的家，”沃尔什探长说，他看着杰基。

sentences.english: Inspector Walsh looked at the things in the front room.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔什探长看着前屋的东西。

sentences.english: ‘Be quiet, please, and sit down, ’Inspector Walsh said.
sentences.chinese: “请安静，坐下，”沃尔什探长说，看着杰基。

sentences.english: ‘I would like to talk first to your nucle, Albert King, ’Inspector Walsh said.
sentences.chinese: “我想先和你的姨父艾伯特金谈谈，”沃尔什探长说。

sentences.english: Inspector Walsh sat in his office and telephoned.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔什探长坐在办公室打电话。

sentences.english: Inspector Walsh watched Roger for a minute.‘I
sentences.chinese: 沃尔什探长看了罗杰一会。

sentences.english: Inspector Walsh got his hat and coat.‘Come on.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔什探长戴上帽子穿上外衣。

sentences.english: ‘Of course.This is your house,’Inspector Walsh said.He watched Jackie.‘What
sentences.chinese: “当然，这是你的家，”沃尔什探长说，他看着杰基。
“这儿不值多少钱，”沃尔什探长说。

sentences.english: Inspector Walsh Watched and then walked slowly to his car.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔什探长注视着她，然后慢慢走向他的车。
女士们，先生们，是弗林探长。
探长马上就开始了提问。

sentences.english: ‘We want to talk about Mrs Clarkson,’Inspector Walsh said.
sentences.chinese: “我们想和你谈谈克拉克森太太，”沃尔什探长说。

definition: master sleuth/lit. miraculous detective/cf Sherlock Holmes 福爾摩斯|福尔摩斯[Fu2 er3 mo2 si1] or Di Renjie 狄仁傑|狄仁杰[Di2 Ren2 jie2]
abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
police department/police station/abbr. of 警察局
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
police station (abbr. for 警察署[jing3 cha2 shu3])
